name: writeepi
author: Writeepi
description: Simple, accessible but powerful all-in-one word-processing and organization app for writers

scripts.build:all: npm run build:webui && npm run build:desktop
scripts.install:all: npm run install:webui && npm run install:desktop && npm run install:server
scripts.auditfix:all: npm run auditfix:webui && npm run auditfix:desktop && npm run auditfix:server
scripts.setversion:windows: npm version %NPM_CONFIG_VER% && cd webui && npm version %NPM_CONFIG_VER% && cd ../server && npm version %NPM_CONFIG_VER% && cd ../desktop && npm version %NPM_CONFIG_VER% && cd .. && npm run install:all
scripts.setversion:linux: npm version ${NPM_CONFIG_VER} && cd webui && npm version ${NPM_CONFIG_VER} && cd ../server && npm version ${NPM_CONFIG_VER} && cd ../desktop && npm version ${NPM_CONFIG_VER} && cd .. && npm run install:all
scripts.container:all: npm run container:build && npm run container:push
scripts.container:devrun: docker run -d --name writeepi-server -p 8337:8337 --network writeepi-dev -e CONF_DB_HOST=postgres-server ghcr.io/jbm-home/writeepi-server:latest
